text: He adama santana! Cayatane yena tomalokaka kono mate'i pralubdha karaiba noraarae—yidarae si tomalokara pitr-matrka jannatara paraa uliya'ichila, si te'omlokaka te'omlokara lajjasthana dekhuraara babe bibastra karaichila. Niscaya si nije arau tara dale tomalokaka ene tha'ira paraa dekhe, ya’ta tomaloke sihamtaka nedekha. Niscaya ami cayatanaka se'isakala lokara abhibharaka karai dicho yisakale imana posana nakarae
